009package imagingbook.common.regions.utils;
010
011import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
012import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
013import ij.process.ShortProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.color.iterate.RandomHueGenerator;
015import imagingbook.common.regions.segment.BinaryRegionSegmentation;
016
017/**
018 * Defines static methods for displaying binary segmentations.
019 */
020public abstract class Display {
021        
022        private Display() {}
023        
024        /**
025         * Utility method that creates an image to display a binary segmentation.
026         * 
027         * @param labeling The region segmentation.
028         * @param color Set {@code true} to color the detected regions.
029         * @return an image of the label array.
030         */
031        public static ImageProcessor makeLabelImage(BinaryRegionSegmentation labeling, boolean color) {
032                return (color) ?  makeLabelImageColor(labeling) : makeLabelImageGray(labeling);
033        }
034
035        private static ColorProcessor makeLabelImageColor(BinaryRegionSegmentation segmentation) {
036                int minLabel = segmentation.getMinLabel();
037                int maxLabel = segmentation.getMaxLabel();
038                int[] colorLUT = new int[maxLabel+1];
039                RandomHueGenerator rcg = new RandomHueGenerator();
040                
041                for (int i = minLabel; i <= maxLabel; i++) {
042                        colorLUT[i] = rcg.next().getRGB(); //makeRandomColor();
043                }
044                
045                int width = segmentation.getWidth();
046                int height = segmentation.getHeight();
047                
048                ColorProcessor cp = new ColorProcessor(width, height);
049                for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
050                        for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
051                                int lb = segmentation.getLabel(u, v);
052                                if (lb >= 0 && lb < colorLUT.length) {
053                                        cp.putPixel(u, v, colorLUT[lb]);
054                                }
055                        }
056                }
057                return cp;
058        }
059        
060        private static ShortProcessor makeLabelImageGray(BinaryRegionSegmentation labeling) {
061                int width = labeling.getWidth();
062                int height = labeling.getHeight();
063                ShortProcessor sp = new ShortProcessor(width, height);
064                for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
065                        for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
066                                int lb = labeling.getLabel(u, v);
067                                sp.set(u, v, (lb >= 0) ? lb : 0);
068                        }
069                }
070                sp.resetMinAndMax();
071                return sp;
072        }
073        
074//      private static int makeRandomColor() {
075//              double saturation = 0.2;
076//              double brightness = 0.2;
077//              float h = (float) Math.random();
078//              float s = (float) (saturation * Math.random() + 1 - saturation);
079//              float b = (float) (brightness * Math.random() + 1 - brightness);
080//              return Color.HSBtoRGB(h, s, b);
081//      }
082
083}
